name: PROJECT_NAME Flutter Dev

onCreateCommand.setup-flutter-project: echo 'Container created - Flutter setup will run on start'

postStartCommand: echo '🚀 Container started - initializing Flutter environment...'
flutter --version && echo '✅ Flutter SDK ready' || echo '⚠️  Flutter SDK not ready yet'
adb devices && echo '✅ ADB service connected' || echo '🔄 ADB service connecting...'
timeout 300 .devcontainer/scripts/setup-flutter-project.sh && echo '✅ Flutter project setup complete' || echo '🔄 Flutter setup running in background...'
